shape_0_per_frame1=r = if(above(bass, 1.2), .6+.4*sin(time*1.234), .1*sin(time*1.234));

shape_0_per_frame8=
shape_0_per_frame9=frametest = equal(frame%2, 0);
shape_0_per_frame10=
shape_0_per_frame11=//x = if(frametest, x - .25*sin(time), x + .25*sin(time);

shape_0_per_frame13=y = y - .1*sin(time*3.14);

shape_1_per_frame12=x = x - .2*sin(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame13=y = y - .2*cos(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame14=x = if(frametest, x, 1-x);
shape_1_per_frame15=y = if(frametest, y, 1-y);

shape_2_per_frame1=r2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.5*sin(time*1.523), 1);
shape_2_per_frame2=g2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.5*sin(time*1.983), 1);
shape_2_per_frame3=b2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.75+.5*sin(time*1.194), 1);
shape_2_per_frame4=rad = rad - .4*bass_att;
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=x = x +.5*sin(time);
shape_2_per_frame7=y = y -.2*cos(time);

per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.980*time) + 0.40*sin(1.047*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.835*time) + 0.40*sin(1.081*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.814*time) + 0.40*sin(1.011*time) );
per_frame_4=q1 = (cx*2-1) + 0.32*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.40*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_5=q2 = (cy*2-1) + 0.52*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_6=q3 = (cx*2-1) + 0.32*( 0.60*sin(0.174*-time) + 0.40*sin(0.364*time) );
per_frame_7=q4 = (cy*2-1) + 0.52*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.271*-time) );
per_frame_8=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%5,0);
per_pixel_1=du = x*2-1 - q1;
per_pixel_2=dv = y*2-1 - q2;
per_pixel_3=dist = sqrt(du*du+dv*dv);
per_pixel_4=ang2 = atan2(du,dv);
per_pixel_5=mult = 0.012/(dist+0.4);
per_pixel_6=dx = mult*sin(ang2-1.5);
per_pixel_7=dy = mult*cos(ang2-1.5);
per_pixel_8=du = x*2-1 - q3;
per_pixel_9=dv = y*2-1 - q4;
per_pixel_10=dist = sqrt(du*du+dv*dv);
per_pixel_11=ang2 = atan2(du,dv);
per_pixel_12=mult = 0.012/(dist+0.4);
per_pixel_13=dx = dx + mult*sin(ang2+1.5);
per_pixel_14=dy = dy + mult*cos(ang2+1.5);
warp_1=`sampler sampler_worms;
warp_2=`float3 color, mus;
warp_3=`float dx,dy;
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5) * aspect.xy;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`float z = q29*2*length(uv1)+rand_frame * 64;
warp_10=`float2 d = normalize(uv1);
warp_11=`float2 rs = clamp(tan(z)*d,-8,8);
warp_12=`uv += .004*GetBlur1(uv)*float2 (0,1);//rs/20;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`
warp_15=`uv6 = .4*sin(uv1*18*rand_frame);
warp_16=`mus = .051/(length(uv6));
warp_17=`mus *= float3 (treb*.5,bass*.5,mid*.5);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 blur = GetBlur2(frac(uv));
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_22=`
warp_23=`float3 ret1 = crisp - blur*.03 + .15*mus;
warp_24=`float2 uv2 = (uv_orig-.5)-float3(bass*.1,treb*.1+0.1*q25,mid*.1);
warp_25=`
warp_26=`q25 = 1;
warp_27=`ret = q25*(ret1*.99-.02) + (1-q25)* GetPixel(uv_orig);
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`// to access a texture on disk: make a sampler.  This example loads "lichen.{tga/jpg/etc}".
comp_2=`sampler2D sampler_fw_lichen;  // _FW = filtering + wrap; _PC = point sampling + edge clamp; etc.
comp_3=`float4    texsize_lichen;     // auto-binds; .xy = (w,h); .zw = (1/w,1/h)
comp_4=`
comp_5=`
comp_6=`shader_body      
comp_7=`
comp_8=`
comp_9=`
comp_10=`{
comp_11=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_12=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, 1-uv));
comp_13=`    ret = ret*1.50-0.2; //old gamma effect
comp_14=`    
comp_15=`ret-=roam_sin.wzy*roam_cos.zxy;
comp_16=`}
